languages.text: "Как мы уже говорили ранее, дитя должно вернуться в лоно Дома. Не откажите в любезности дать на то согласие".

traits.locale_text: "Как мы уже говорили ранее, дитя должно вернуться в лоно Дома. Не откажите в любезности дать на то согласие".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."
languages.original_text: "Как мы уже говорили ранее, дитя должно вернуться в лоно Дома. Не откажите в любезности дать на то согласие".

traits.locale_text: "Like we said earlier, the child must return to her House's embrace. Would you be so kind as to agree?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Like we said earlier, the child must return to her House's embrace. Would you be so kind as to agree?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “正如我们之前所言，这孩子必须返回她的家族。我们希望您能慷慨地答应这个条件。”
languages.original_text: "As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."

traits.locale_text: “正如我们之前所言，这孩子必须返回她的家族。我们希望您能慷慨地答应这个条件。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Como ya hemos dicho, la niña debe volver al redil de su casa. Esperamos que lo permita amablemente».
languages.original_text: "As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."

traits.locale_text: «Como ya hemos dicho, la niña debe volver al redil de su casa. Esperamos que lo permita amablemente».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「先程も言った通り、あの子は元の家に戻らなければならないのだ。承諾していただけると幸いだ」
languages.original_text: "As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."

traits.locale_text: 「先程も言った通り、あの子は元の家に戻らなければならないのだ。承諾していただけると幸いだ」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Wie bereits gesagt, muss das Kind in sein Haus zurückkehren. Wir hoffen auf Eure Großzügigkeit, das zu erlauben."
languages.original_text: "As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."

traits.locale_text: "Wie bereits gesagt, muss das Kind in sein Haus zurückkehren. Wir hoffen auf Eure Großzügigkeit, das zu erlauben."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Comme nous l'avons déjà souligné, l'Enfant doit revenir sous la tutelle de sa maison. Nous espérons que vous aurez la courtoisie de ne pas vous y opposer. »
languages.original_text: "As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."

traits.locale_text: « Comme nous l'avons déjà souligné, l'enfant doit revenir sous la tutelle de sa maison. Nous espérons que vous aurez la courtoisie de ne pas vous y opposer. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Daha önce de dediğimiz gibi çocuk, Hane ocağına dönmeli. Umarım karşı çıkmama lütfunu gösterirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."

traits.locale_text: "Daha önce de söylediğim gibi, çocuk Hane ocağına geri dönmeli. Umarım karşı çıkmama lütfunu gösterirsiniz."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
